snippet.title: Slave Zero X - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Slave Zero X is a stylish 2.5D character action game set in the biopunk world of Slave Zero (1999). Run & Slash your way through a dystopian future in this character action game which will resonate with fans of Devil May Cry, Strider, and Guilty Gear. Slave Zero X is releasing soon and a demo is available on Steam.

#GameTrailers #Gaming #SteamNextFest
